welcome_message_body: "Welcome to El Segundo, the charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches and friendly atmosphere. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything this vibrant city has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Torrance Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Monica Airport caters to private and corporate aircrafts, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves general aviation flights and offers various amenities for pilots and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers and pilots.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves commercial flights and private charters.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport caters to private jets and VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Van Nuys Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling on private or chartered flights, the private terminal at Municipal Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
